title: China. Part 2. Life in the country
brief_description: Reveals China as a land of contrasts. Shows sheep herding in the Sunkiang province, terraced hillsides planted with rice in the more temperate areas, inland lakes and rivers which provide fish, life in country towns, and harvesting activities. Edited from “China!”.
